bwwExcerpt: While these characters are underdeveloped and in many ways stereotypical, the tension between actors Emily Bautista and Anthony Festa feels real. Not only do they have believable chemistry, but they carry out the vocal Olympics their roles demand with ease. Bautista in particular commands the stage in every moment she appears.
